channel.title: EQ2-Daily.com Everquest 2 Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Cyanbane
channel.description: 3 Casual EQ2 players discussing the news and happenings of the EverQuest2 Community and news about the MMORPG.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discussion in Norrathian Standard Time
channel.itunes:summary: 3 Casual EQ2 players discussing the news and happenings of the EverQuest 2 Community and news about the MMORPG.

item.title: Show 50 - Knowing Your Jarsath Wastes of an EQ2 Podcast (10.24.2007)
item.description: This podcast we discuss GU #39, Shard of Fear, Adamantium Pigs, Ruins of Kunark Impressions including spacious zones and details on a few of the zones like Jasarith Wastes, Karnors Castle, Skyfire, LOIO and other places of interest, and we announced Rot and Vals Beta Key Contest Hide and Seek.
item.itunes:summary: This podcast we discuss GU #39, Shard of Fear, Adamantium Pigs, Ruins of Kunark Impressions including spacious zones and details on a few of the zones like Jasarith Wastes, Karnors Castle, Skyfire, LOIO and other places of interest, and we announced Rot and Vals Beta Key Contest Hide and Seek.
item.itunes:keywords: Everquest 2, GU 39, Shard of Fear, Kunark, Rise of Kunark, Norrath, Expansion, EQ2 Expansion

item.title: Show 49 - Knowing Your Kunark Expedition of an EQ2 Podcast (9.20.2007)
item.description: This podcast we are minus Val and plus a Grim, we discuss the appearance tab, offhand proc'ing, how patches are applied, Unrest's new persistent group settings, the elimination of dual wield, Legends of Norrath, Spyte's History of EQ2 Part 2, bioshock, holes-in-the-wall, recording podcasts on gokarts and more.
item.itunes:summary: This podcast we are minus Val and plus a Grim, we discuss the appearance tab, offhand proc'ing, how patches are applied, Unrest's new persistent group settings, the elimination of dual wield, Legends of Norrath, Spyte's History of EQ2 Part 2, bioshock, holes-in-the-wall, recording podcasts on gokarts and more.
item.itunes:keywords: Everquest 2, GU 38, Legends of Norrath, SOE, Procing, Grimwell

item.title: Show 47 - Knowing Your D'Vinnian Throne of an EQ2 Podcast (8.29.2007)
item.description: This podcast we discuss GU 38, Legends of Norrath, Slowburn, EQ2-Daily.com Version 2.0, Spyte's History of EQ2 Part 1, and we have an interview with Scott Martins and Kyle Heuer of SOE Denver about Legends of Norrath and it's future.
item.itunes:summary: This podcast we discuss GU 38, Legends of Norrath, Slowburn, EQ2-Daily.com Version 2.0, Spyte's History of EQ2 Part 1, and we have an interview with Scott Martins and Kyle Heuer of SOE Denver about Legends of Norrath and it's future.
item.itunes:keywords: Everquest 2, FanFaire 2007, Legends of Norrath, SOE Denver, Decks, GU 38

item.description: More details about Legends of Norrath from Evan Ryans a SOE Denver Employee.
item.itunes:summary: More details about Legends of Norrath from Evan Ryans a SOE Denver Employee.
item.itunes:keywords: Everquest 2, FanFaire 2007, Legends of Norrath

item.title: Show 45 - Knowing Your Bonemire of an EQ2 Podcast (7.26.2007)
item.description: This podcast we GU 37, FanFaire 2007, Val's Podcast Panels, Vegas Strip Clubs, Illegal movement of Alcohol across state lines and Metal Karaoke, oh and the 2008 FanFaire Live Quest Race (that does not include Illinois).
item.itunes:summary: This podcast we GU 37, FanFaire 2007, Val's Podcast Panels, Vegas Strip Clubs, Illegal movement of Alcohol across state lines and Metal Karaoke, oh and the 2008 FanFaire Live Quest Race (that does not include Illinois).

item.description: This podcast we discuss hints of Rise of Kunark Spells, Keg Pilfering, Fabled EOF Armor Drops, an interview with the SUWT crew, Diet Coke with Vitamins, Tom Sawyer and the let down of Ice Comet.

item.title: Show 40 - Knowing Your Fallen Gate of an EQ2 Podcast (4.13.2007)
item.description: This podcast was recorded with all of us in the same physical location! drinking! alot! We manage to discuss GU #34 preview, rumors of Neriak, the PVP Test Server, an interview with Khell our siggy maker, and Rot's Mount Guide.

item.title: Show 12 - Collecting Fern Leaves of an EQ2 Podcast (11.30.2005)
item.description: This Show we discuss a lot of major stuff that went to the live server with LU #17. Topics include loss of shard recovery, field repair kits, stuns stifles for mezzers in epic battles, Splitpaw Nerfing, NPC Tags, EQ2 Guides, Antonia in Stuff, Blackguard's interview with ogaming, and our Troubador / Dirge Class Discussion.
